chunk:
Be Natural Organics CoQ10 Balancing Mist

Brand: Be Natural Organics

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Aqua (water), aloe barbadensis (aloe vera) leaf juice, helichrysum floral Water, C12-15 alkyl benzoate (and) tocopheryl acetate (and) ubiquinone , sodium hyaluronate, salix nigra (willow) bark extract and glycerin, citrullus la

ycerin, citrullus lanatus (watermelon) extract and glycerin, organic laminaria digitata (sea kelp) extract, cucumis sativus (cucumber) extract, gluconolactone and sodium benzoate, sodium citrate.

Directions: Lightly mist face after cleansing and throughout the day to balance, hydrate and nourish.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODER
Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity; LOW: Cancer
